an6.118:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo ajjhattam kaye …pe…
an6.118:1.14: Kammaramatam, bhassaramatam, niddaramatam, sanganikaramatam, indriyesu aguttadvaratam, bhojane amattannutam.
an6.118:1.15: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahaya bhabbo ajjhattabahiddha dhammesu dhammanupassi viharitun”ti.
